Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB via 87th, Western, 83rd, California & 87th; EB via 87th, California, 83rd, Damen & 87th due to police activity nr 87th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 87th/Rockwell.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 87th, Western, 83rd, California and 87th.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, California, 83rd, Damen and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.
